content.rendered:
Our Napkins are 100% cotton. 

Suitable for all manner of commercial venues.

Its soft feel, classic and elegant look will enhance the look and ambiance of your venue.

Please note:

– Wash before use
– Wash up to 60’c
– Iron whilst damp on a hot setting
– As this is a natural product, it will shrink over time up to 8% of size
– 215GSM 
– Finished with a 1.5cm hem

All prices are subject to VAT.
